participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about learning new languages and music.
participant_1.background: one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. my next language to study is french. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. i'm a musician.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and stylish, with a keen interest in high-end fashion and luxury items.
participant_2.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer.
